root.name: Silpheed: The Lost Planet
root.description: Notable for fabled arcade developer Treasure's contribution to its production, Silpheed: The Lost Planet is a Playstation 2 sequel-cum-remake of the Game Arts developed vertical shooter Silpheed for home computers and later the Mega CD. Released in both Japan and western countries, the western version is considered superior due to it's support for the analog controls and improved framerate/performance.
